text: Happy Birthday, Selena Gomez! The pop star turned 26 on Sunday and celebrated her birthday a day earlier at a party with friends, as shown on Instagram by her singer Grace VanderWaal. ` ` Huge Happy Birthday TODAY 4 SELENA!!!!!!!!!! Thanks for everything,'' she wrote. ` ` I hope you have the best day.'' In the pictures, Selena wears a denim jumpsuit and covers her face with surprise and hugs VanderWaal. She also sees an opened box of white frosted cupcakes with ` ` Happy Birthday Selena'' spelled out in blue. Gomez and several friends had lunch together and then VanderWaal for Imagine Dragons at the Forum in Inglewood, California on Saturday, E! News has learned
